recipe.title: Court Bouillon
ingredients: 1/2 small leek (white and pale green parts only)
2 bay leaves (not the stronger California variety)
instructions: Cut up leek, carrot, and celery and in a large saucepan bring to a boil with remaining ingredients. Boil mixture 10 minutes and pour through a fine sieve into a bowl. Court bouillon keeps, covered and chilled, 3 days or, frozen, 2 months.
